StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetReferralHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int AS
DECLARE @MarineID int
SELECT @MarineID = M.MARINE_ID FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON (N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID AND C.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) INNER JOIN MARINE M ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = M.MARINE_ID
SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(11), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 106) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + ', ' + RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS REFERRAL_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, RS.SOURCE_DESCRIPTION FROM REFERRAL R INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (R.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID AND R.DEP_CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_SOURCE RS ON N.SOURCE_CODE = RS.SOURCE_CODE INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID
UNION
SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(11), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 106) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + ', ' + RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS REFERRAL_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, RS.SOURCE_DESCRIPTION FROM REFERRAL R INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (R.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID AND R.MARINE_ID = @MarineID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_SOURCE RS ON N.SOURCE_CODE = RS.SOURCE_CODE INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID
/* old way SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(11), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 106) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + ', ' + RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS REFERRAL_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM REFERRAL R INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (R.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID AND R.DEP_CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID ORDER BY C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE DESC
*/
